aboutMe.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMe.text: My name is Yaroslav Romanov. I am a Frontend Developer with 2 years of hands-on experience crafting immersive digital experiences. Proficient in transforming ideas into pixel-perfect, user-friendly interfaces, I thrive on the dynamic interplay of design and code. A relentless learner in the ever-evolving tech landscape, I bring creativity and precision to every project, ensuring seamless user interactions and visually stunning web solutions. Let’s code the future together!
